text:
Yes, and let’s start with a pay increase to the #nhspay15 It’s about time. Clapping is great, but now is the time as you said. No more excuses. These people have EARNED this twofold!

#NHSHeroes #NHS #COVID19 #vaccine #lockdown #Pay #StaySafe #StayHome @BorisJohnson @MattHancock https://t.co/6hPZL4AGfR
